Este jogo é fenomenal, um dos melhores que já joguei. Nele você vai encontrar puzzles desafiadores, gráficos lindos e uma história bastante imersiva e bem humorada. O modo multi-player é extremamente divertido e vai te arrancar muita risada. No geral, é um jogo simplesmente magnífico e vale cada centavo. Recomendadíssimo!!!

UNLESS YOU DON'T LIKE SCIENCE ITS A GOOD GAME

The story is much longer here and expands upon the mechanics of the previous game. The puzzles are delightfully difficult and the game mechanics are so incredibly intuitive. It's hard to dislike this game. Portal 2 also expands upon the lore of the previous game, especially with the Lab Rat comics. It's just an all around great game. I also [i] totally [/i]didn't look up any walkthroughs for this game either.

This game is for inteligent guys, (kids can play but like 10+ years), i like it, because is good and if u can not pass the walkgrouth, u can see videos and u are gonna see that is soooooo nice: science, tecnology when u are advanced like me (pass the walkgrouth) and is so but sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo nice
The greatness of Portal amplified, with a significantly longer story and a lot of fun new types of puzzles. And the dialogue is oh so wonderful.

It goes without saying, if you are using steam to see this review and haven't played Portal 2, go play it. NOW. A masterpiece of a game with extreme creativeness on level design rearding the environment nd the use of various tools, including of course portals.

Muy entretenido si te gusta pensar. A pesar de ello, solo los niveles más altos suponen un reto entretenido. Los niveles bajos son muy fáciles, simplemente un tutorial donde te enseñan las mecánicas del juego. Yo pasé directamente al máximo nivel sin hacer los primeros y fue muy entretenido. Al fin y al cabo, los niveles de dificultad mayores son solo una combinación compleja de los básicos. Otro aspecto negativo es que me parece un juego muy corto aunque para el precio que tiene no se puede pedir más.
En resumen, lo recomiendo si no se paga más de 10€ por él.
ive beaten this game a bunch of times, never gets old

Portal is a great puzzle game for the person who wants to test the mind but also has a deep lore for the more...enthusiastic fans. Overall portal has something for most people puzzles, action, lore. Definitely would recommend.
One of the best games you'll play in your life
fun story line with fun challenges
Essential for anybody with a Steam account

Portal 2 is a plethora of fun mixed with good amount of puzzle solving. The characters are charismatic and the story is enjoyable. Just like Portal 1, you use the portal gun to solve puzzles and the gun feels better then ever. Valve has also elaborated on the puzzles by adding new ways to solve them. For example, the Hard Light puzzles. All in all, Portal 2 is a masterwork of a game, just like it's counterpart.

Con graficazos, muchos puzles y una buena historia.
10/10

Шедевр игрового дизайна и сценарного мастерства! Просто физика и логика, а игра никак не мешает решать головоломки: ты придумал решение - ты решил, без долбежки по кнопкам и выгадывания миллиметров. Невероятное внимание к деталям (IBM PS/2 в качестве местных рабочих станций), очень сильный сюжет.
Монологи здешних персонажей добавляют море удовольствия. И очень постарались актеры русской озвучки!
Com certeza um dos melhores jogos de puzzle da steam. Ainda dá pra desfrutar em coop!

It's very rare that i give a geniune recommendation for a game but this one... I just had to. It doesn't just worth it's money. It's like 5 times better what you would expect for it's price. Makes you use your head, has interesting, funny, unexpected, rich but not mainstream cliché story. The amount of creativity invested in the levels is just amazing. There are lots of amazing extra detalis on the map. Its not even that super short like the first Portal game. Its like 3 times longer or so. And even if you happen to get to the end of the singleplayer campaign, you can still play with a friend wich is even more funny and amazing. There are also plenty of community maps. So the possibilities are like limitless. If you want to use your brain, have fun while doing it, this game is for you. Go buy it, you won't regret
Perfect! Lov3d it! Much better then Portal 1
Great puzzle, really great as a teamwork game
Very fun and a good game

I dont even need to review this since it's so widely known as one of the best games ever.

Está bien, dejemos en claro que Portal 2 es un juego sublime y que es totalmente recomendado para cualquiera, ya sea alguien que lleve jugando videojuegos desde hace algún tiempo o personas que nunca han probado alguno y quieran entrar en el medio. Es cierto que abusa un poco de los scripts, pero son espectaculares. Los puzzles con la portal gun son muy interesantes, y conforme avances en el juego aparecerán distintos elementos con los que puedes interactuar, complicando el desafío y haciendo la resolución más gratificante.
Si pueden adquirir el pack de ambos juegos, no se van a arrepentir. Es una experiencia increíble 100% recomendada.
